choices: Shrink yourself.
Make Mary grow.
Make Kelly grow.
Grow both women.
Wait until later to try it.
1.content:
It's 2PM, and nobody is out at the golf course. In fact, it's been 2 hours since anybody was here. In that time, you've been sitting at a table putting marks on the driving range balls so that nobody tries to steal them from the place. In short, you are bored stiff. But you can't complain much; it's free money if you just sit around with no customers.

But today, things are going to be different. You have a way to make this a fun work day...for you, at least. You reach into your pocket and pull out a small rectangular device. It almost looks like a small remote, but there are only a few buttons on it. It's a size-changing device, and you want to give it a whirl.

You think about the possibilities: You could shrink yourself down if you wanted, or you could try making Mary or Kelly -- the other two people in the clubhouse -- grow a bit. A smile forms on your face. You like the idea of giant women; you've had a giantess fetish for years. It wouldn't be hard to do, either. Mary and Kelly are both in the back room. You could head back and try it right now, or you could wait.
1.title: Slow Day at Work

choices: Walk up to Mary
Walk up to Kelly
11.content: You press the shrink button and shrink yourself to a centimetre tall, you go over to the two girls,they looked like towering goddesses
11.title: Shrink yourself.

choices: Front gate
Showers
112.content:
You look up and see your giant coworker Kelly. Its unbelievable how amazing she looks right now. Kelly was a absolute beauty before but now, the fact she's a giantess, She is like a real goddess. Her blonde straight hair over her fine shaped face. Her perfect figure body managing to look better than it ever has. You would be lying if you said you didn't have a crush on her. Even though she's several years older than you. You put the size device that shrunk with you into your back pocket and make your trek to Kelly.

Currently she's sitting in the lobby on one off the chairs. Since its a slow day both of you don't really have to worry about a guest. Hence the reason you shrunk yourself. You walk up to her giant sneaker and come stunned again at the colossal in front of you. You smile as you start running towards the sneaker and pulled yourself onto it.

Once on top of the shoe you decide to get your freaky foot fetish a quick shot. You run over towards Kelly's sneaker opening and took a big sniff. The foot odor entering your nostrils and even though it was disgusting you were loving every second.

You kept sniffing over and over again. In the meantime getting a massive erection. You were so into your own little world that you didn't notice that Mary your boss came in . Quite pissed off by the fact that both her employees are goofing around

"Kelly get up. I don't pay you to sit down" Mary scolded "Fine, but I'll be doing nothing standing either" "At least look like your busy. And where the hell is (Your Name)!" Mary yelled as she walked out and looked for you.

Kelly got up from the chair and started walking towards the _________. With you hanging onto her shoelace for dear life.
112.title: Choosing Kelly

choices: You grow Mary a couple inches, to see if it works.
You grow Mary a whole foot and hope she reacts.
You grow Mary several feet until her head touches the ceiling.
Nothing happens.
The device malfunctions and you shrink!
12.content:
You decide to try it on Mary. It'll be funny to see her reaction. You get up from the table and start walking toward the back room of the clubhouse, but before you get to the doorway, you pause. You think to yourself that you might get a better reaction from her if she didn't know that you were behind it. For that matter, since you're only trying it on her, you don't want Kelly to see you do it, either.

Your thoughts are interrupted when Kelly emerges from the back room. You jump back, slightly startled.

"Sorry, didn't mean to scare you," Kelly says, brushing her dark brown hair out of her face. "I'm heading to the store. I'll be back later. Mary's in the back if you need her."

You wait as Kelly leaves the clubhouse, then gets in her green Jeep and drives away. Now's my chance! you think to yourself.

Just then, Mary comes out of the back room. Again, you get startled.

"Easy, Nick," she says. "No need to get scared of me." She looks around the clubhouse. "Still no customers, huh?"

"No," you say. "I don't know why it's so dead."

"Well, hopefully somebody comes soon," Mary says. "Did you put marks on those golf balls like I told you to?"

"Most of them, yes," you say.

"Let me look them over," says Mary. She walks over to the table and starts inspecting each golf ball one by one. Her back is facing you, and she doesn't see you take the size remote and point it at her. You can barely contain your excitement over what's about to happen. With your thumb on the "Grow" button, you press down and...
12.title: Make Mary grow.

choices: She turns around and sees she's taller than you.
Her shoes break.
122.content:
You decide to grow Mary by a foot. That should certainly be noticeable. After all, since you're 5'11" and she's normally 5'8", she'll practically tower over you at her new height. You press the button to make her grow. A low hum comes from the remote, but not enough for Mary to notice. Slowly, you see Mary's body getting larger. From what you know of the remote, it is supposed to keep most clothing fabrics intact, so Mary's shirt and pants won't rip or anything like that. You don't know if that applies to shoes, though. If she's wearing socks, those might stay intact...

You shake your head and snap back to the present moment. You release the button when it looks like Mary's grown a full foot. Right on cue, Mary stops what she's doing and looks down at the table. "Did something happen to the table?" she asks, still not facing you.

"What do you mean?" you ask.

"Well it seems lower than before," Mary says. "It's weird. It seemed just fine a minute ago."

You shrug. "Looks okay to me."

"Maybe I should look into getting another table," Mary says. You're kind of surprised she hasn't noticed anything about how the ceiling seems closer to her head, or how everything in the clubhouse looks like it's gotten smaller. Mary must have been really focused on inspecting those golf balls.

But sure enough, something does happen to get Mary's attention to her new height. What event tips her off?
122.title: You grow Mary a whole foot and hope she reacts.

choices: Mary sees you smiling and gets suspicious.
Mary leaves the clubhouse.
Suddenly, Mary reverts back to normal size.
1221.content:
Finally, Mary turns around. She looks confused. "What's going on here?" she asks.

You feign innocence and casually slip the remote back into your pocket. "What do you mean?" you ask.

"I'm taller than you," Mary says. "I can see it from here, I'm taller than you. By a lot."

Again, you fake surprise. "This is news to me," you say.

Mary walks over to you, grimacing just a little bit. "Look for yourself," she says. "I'm practically a foot taller than you now. I've never been taller, and definitely not by this much."

"I don't know what to say," you tell Mary. "Though you look very attractive at that height."

"This is no time for jokes, Nick," says Mary. "Something isn't right here." She walks over to the doorway that leads to the back room. You notice that she seems to be walking awkwardly. "See, Nick?" she says. "My head goes over the top of the doorway. It wasn't like that a minute ago. I could go right through it before." Again, a slight pained look comes to her face.

"Are you okay?" you ask.

Mary bends down and takes off her sandals. "My sandals feel tight. Very tight," she says. She checks the sole where the size is labeled. "It says Size 8, which I know I am, but they weren't tight at all when I put them on this morning." She pauses for a moment. "I can't believe it," she says. "I've...grown somehow."

"That's pretty unbelievable," you say. "I mean, nobody grows that much that quickly." You can barely contain your giddiness. You want to find out how much longer you can keep this up.

"I can't explain this," Mary says. "It is very, very strange..."

You can't contain the grin on your face any longer. You just hope Mary doesn't see it.
1221.title: Mary notices she's taller than you.

choices: Mary reaches down to grab you.
Mary goes into a rage!
12211.content:
"What are you smiling about, Nick?" Mary says.

Your heart stops for a second. Time to think on your feet. "Uh...nothing," you say. Not the greatest defense, you think to yourself.

"Did you have something to do with this?" Mary says. She steps toward you and towers over you. "If you know something, now would be a good time to speak up." Your heart is beating faster than normal. Clearly you're nervous, and Mary can sense it. She puts her big hands on your shoulders and grips tightly. "What did you do?" she says with a calm tone, a tone that defies her apparent displeasure with her situation.

You take a deep breath. "I think I should show you something," you say. "But not here. We need to go outside, where we'll have space. Like maybe the parking lot."

Mary looks confused, but nods. "Okay," she says. "It's not like we have customers anyway."

"After you," you say, sweeping your hand toward the door. Mary goes out first, ducking her head in the doorway. You follow behind. The two of you go to the middle of the parking lot. There, you reveal the remote from your pocket.

"What is that thing?" asks Mary.

"A size-changing device," you say. "I made you grow about a foot when you were checking the golf balls on the table."

"You did what?" Mary says. "But...why? What possible reason could you have?"

"Oh, I have a reason," you say, "but it might be hard to explain to you." You smile. "Perhaps I can show you."

"I think you need to quit playing around," says Mary. "Whatever warped ideas you have in your head, I am not going to be a part of it."

"You already are," you say. You press the "Grow" button and Mary shoots up to a bigger height. You stop at around 30 feet, a sort of "mini-giantess" height. Big enough for now, anyway. You look up at Mary's huge body, all the way down to her feet which are as long as a car.

"Now the fun begins," you say. Mary, meanwhile, is NOT amused. She has a look in her eyes that you don't like. She's about to do something, something that you might not have counted on...
12211.title: Mary sees you smiling and gets suspicious.

choices: Try to make a getaway in the golf cart.
Defend yourself inside the clubhouse.
122111.content:
Mary's oversized hand comes toward you. She's intent on picking you up. Knowing her, she probably doesn't mean you any harm, but you don't want to chance it. You'd like to have as much control over your environment as possible. As the hand comes down, you dodge and roll away. Mary's hand hits the ground causing a light rumble.

"I'm not messing around, Nick," says Mary. "I don't know why you think this is a good idea, but let me tell you this, it is NEVER a good idea to make a giant angry. If you think I'm mean normally, just wait and see what I do at this size."

You know Mary is serious, which is a shame, because otherwise you'd think she was really getting into the part. Still, she's mad, and she intends to get you. You need to distance yourself somehow. Unfortunately, being at a golf course doesn't leave you with many options.

You can't make it to your car because Mary is standing between you and it. However, off to the side of the clubhouse sits one of the golf carts you use to check the greens. It's not fast, but it could be enough to escape. Unless Mary gets to it first, of course...

Then again, you could always make a stand inside the clubhouse. If forced to, you've got plenty of clubs laying around in there, so you have weapons to defend yourself should Mary get really angry. Then again, you've seen enough to know that giants and buildings of any size don't get along well, and it usually ends badly for the building...
122111.title: Mary reaches down to grab you.

choices: Mary sees the remote in your hand.
Mary keeps growing!
Kelly comes back to the clubhouse.
1222.content:
You start to hear a faint ripping sound. It's the kind of sound you hear when clothes tear. But, surely that can't Mary, can it? You remember seeing in the manual that major fabrics like cotton and denim won't break as a result of the size change, so Mary's shirt and pants should be fine. Then, you look to the ground. You can actually see the tear line going through Mary's sandals. It's almost like something you'd see on TV, the kind of thing that happens for dramatic effect.

Mary notices, too. "Oh my God!" she exclaims, just as the tearing is complete. With a small pop, both sandals break, and now Mary stands barefoot in the clubhouse. "What the hell just happened?" she says, picking up her sandals to examine them. "There shouldn't be anything wrong with these. I've had them for years! It's not like my foot just grew three sizes or something."

You decide to help Mary along. "Well, maybe they did," you say. "Something does look a bit...different about you."

Mary looks confused. "What are you talking about?" she asks, then looks around the clubhouse. "Oh," she says. "Oh...my...what is going on? I'm...I'm actually bigger! Really, I am! I'm bigger than you, I'm taller than the doorway now...I can't believe it!"

"And now you have no shoes to wear," you say.

Mary sighs. "Really that should be the least of my worries now, but you're right, I guess I'll just have to go barefoot for now. Maybe I could ask you to pick up some shoes for me? Maybe...size 11 or 12, I guess?"

You shrug. "I kinda like you like this," you say.

Now Mary looks really confused. "What is that supposed to mean?"

You've said too much; your cover is just about blown. Time to backpedal. "Uh, what I meant to say was--" you start, but you don't get to finish. Another event happens to steer the conversation away from that, at least for now. What happens?
1222.title: Her shoes break.

choices: Mary crushes the remote underfoot.
Mary picks up the remote and shrinks you down.
12221.content:
"What's that in your hand?" asks Mary.

You try to hide the remote. "Nothing, really," you say. "Just a little...um..."

"A little what? Let me see that!" Mary moves in and tries to grab it from you. Instinctively you pull away, but Mary is stronger than you anticipated. Her hand locks onto yours and she begins to squeeze. The pain shoots through your arm pretty quickly and you drop the remote. Mary looks down and slides it toward her with her foot. She begins looking at it.

"This has a lot of buttons on it," Mary says. "Looks a little too fancy to be 'nothing' like you said." She smirks and sets it back on the ground. "But if it's really nothing, then you know you shouldn't be messing with toys at work. I'll just have to get of rid of this." She puts her foot on top of the remote and gently presses down. You can hear a couple cracks and groans from the plastic.

"Stop!" you say.

"Feel like talking?" says Mary.

Your heart is practically in your throat. "That's a size-changing remote," you say. "I brought it because I wanted to try it out on you."

Mary's foot is still on the remote. Her hands are folded across her chest. "Continue," she says.

"You can't destroy it," you say.

"Wanna bet?" Mary pushes down harder. More cracks and groans.

"No, that's not what I meant!" you say, almost in a panic. "What I meant was, if you break it now, while you've grown, you can't change back. It's not like it wears off. It's permanent unless the remote restores you."

Mary glares coldly at you. "Is that so?" she says, then looks to the floor. "So, this thing can shrink as well as grow things."

"Yes," you say. "But again, any changes made to the body are permanent if the remote breaks."

"I wonder if I should believe any of what you're saying," Mary says.

You feel very nervous. "Please, Mary," you beg, "I'm not lying. I meant every word."

"Well," says Mary, "let's find out."
12221.title: Mary sees the remote in your hand.

choices: She is disgusted.
She is intrigued and wants to hear more.
122212.content:
Mary takes her foot off the remote. You breathe a sigh of relief. Your relief is quickly erased though when you feel a strange warmth around your body. Before you know it, you start to shrink! The clubhouse and Mary start getting larger and larger. In a matter of moments you are only 6 inches tall, barely the size of a doll. Directly in front of you is Mary's now gigantic feet.

"Well, looks like you were telling the truth," Mary says. "I have to say, this is pretty amazing!"

You don't say anything. You just keep staring at Mary's feet.

Mary notices this and wiggles her toes. "What's wrong? Are you scared of my big feet?" she asks, almost mocking you. Still you say nothing. In a flash, Mary quickly stomps her foot in front of you. The floor shakes like an earthquake and you fall down, but you aren't hurt. "Answer me, Nick!" she shouts. "You may be tiny, but I'm still your boss and I asked you a question. Are you scared of my feet?"

Rather than take the time to think up a lie, you instinctively tell the truth. The WHOLE truth. "N-no," you say. "In fact, I love your feet. I've always stared at them whenever you come in here. That's part of why I brought the remote. I thought if I had the chance I could shrink down and see your feet up close and at giant size. I just...I'm attracted to them. That's all I can say."

Mary stands there, mouth open. Finally, she reacts to what you said...
122212.title: Mary picks up the remote and shrinks you down.

choices: Mary pushes down and crushes your member.
Mary rubs your member with her big toe.
1222121.content:
"How DARE you!" Mary exclaims after you confess your attraction to her feet. "Do you have any idea how inappropriate that is? I'm your boss, for god's sake!"

"I...I was hoping it wouldn't happen like this," you say timidly.

"I don't know how you thought it would happen, you pervert," Mary says. Her disgust and contempt is clearly on her face. "And to think of all the times I've been in the clubhouse wearing sandals," she says. "I can only imagine what you thought about when you got home, or worse...while you were still here!"

"Look, Mary --" Before you can get another word out, Mary's foot shoots forward and knocks you over. Surprised, you stay down, unsure of what to do or what's going on in Mary's head. Mary takes a couple steps toward you, the ground now shaking with her booming footsteps. Mary lifts a foot over you, flexing and wiggling her toes as she does so.

"Mary, no! Don't kill me, please!" you beg.

"Shut up, Nick," Mary says. "I'm not going to crush you. But I'm sure thinking about it. Right now I want to see just how perverted you are."

"I don't understand," you say.

Mary gently places her big toe on your chest. "I think you'll figure it out in a minute," she says coldly. She starts sliding her big toe down your body, and you do realize what's going on. Her toe stops at your groin, where you presently have a boner from the whole situation.

"Just like I thought," Mary said. "You really are sick."

"Mary, let me explain," you say.

"I'm not sure I want you to," Mary answers. "What did you really hope to get out of using that remote and changing my size? You wanted me to be bigger so my feet could be huge, is that right? And then what were you going to do? Would you have really had the balls to masturbate in front of me?"

"Mary...I don't know what to say. I'm a guy, after all." It was a weak defense, but all you could manage.

"We'll see about that," Mary says with a sneer.
1222121.title: She is disgusted.

choices: Tell Kelly to get some work gloves from the clubhouse.
Pretend like there's something wrong with one of the mini-golf holes.
Hey, look!  A bird!
Try the old "What's that behind you?" trick.
Screw it, just use the remote now!
13.content:
Thinking it over, you decide you like Kelly better. Both women are nice enough, but if (or more accurately, when) Mary gets in a foul mood, bad things might happen. You don't like dealing with Mary when she's pissed off at normal size; imagine how bad it would be if she were giant-sized. So, Kelly it is, then.

You start thinking about how you plan to get Kelly alone for long enough to make her grow. You're also thinking about how big you want her to be. Maybe just a little at first, maybe a lot. Just then you hear Mary's voice from the back room.

"Nick!" she says. "If you're done putting marks on those golf balls, I need you to bring one of the benches over to the clubhouse."

You try not to groan. Menial labor is not one of your favorite things to do. Still, you might be able to work this in your favor. "Which bench?" you ask.

"The one out by the 16th hole on the miniature course," Mary says. "It's looking pretty rough from being out in the elements. We need to put some paint on it."

You know that when Mary says "we", she means you. Something else to look forward to, you say to yourself.

"Um, Mary," you say, "those benches are pretty heavy and awkward to carry. I think I'm going to need help moving it down here."

"I know," says Mary. "Kelly's going out to help you."

Score! That's exactly the opening you were looking for. You and Kelly head out to the wooden bench in question. Kelly brushes back her brown hair and looks down at her feet.

"Maybe I should have changed into something other than flip-flops," she says. She takes a look at the bench. "I know Mary wants to put paint on this thing, but even if she did, this still looks awful. She needs to get a new one."

"I think I've mentioned that to her before," you say. "She says she doesn't have the money to buy a new one, so as long as this one is somewhat usable, she's keeping it."

Kelly snorts. "Maybe someone should just take an axe and smash this shit to pieces," she says.

Who needs an axe? you think to yourself. This almost seems like an appropriate time to use the remote on Kelly, but you need to be discreet somehow. You need to distract Kelly long enough to use the remote on her...
13.title: Make Kelly grow.

choices: Kelly says, "I'll smash the bench, then I'll smash YOU!"
Mary comes running outside to see what's happened.
A customer pulls into the parking lot.
135.content:
You decide to just go for it, but you'll work a little dialogue in first.

"I didn't know you hated the bench that much," you say to Kelly.

"Well, just look at it," says Kelly. "I know it's been out in the weather for God knows how long, but when it's this worn-looking and chipped, just get rid of it."

You shrug. "I agree, but it won't exactly fit in the dumpster."

"Like I said, take an axe and smash it up," Kelly says. "I'd make kindling out of this in a second."

"We'll see about that," you say. Quickly, you take out the remote and fire it at Kelly.

"What do you mean?" is all Kelly can say before she's engulfed in a blue light. In seconds her body starts expanding upward and outward. At first you notice her clothes are growing with her, which is okay, but then you hear a faint snap from the ground. Looking down, you see the straps on Kelly's flip-flops broke. You're a bit puzzled by this. Her shirt and pants are fine, but the shoes broke. Maybe it has something to do with cotton and denim, but you're not really worried about that now. The point is you've actually succeeded in making a giantess! You stop when Kelly is 20 feet tall. She looks around in shock.

"What the hell just happened to me?" she says, looking down at you. "What the fuck did you just do?"

"I made you bigger," you say. "I wanted to see you smash the bench like you said you would."

"So you turned me into a monster? What were you thinking?" Kelly is very angry right now. You try to push forward and hope she just calms down.

"Relax, Kelly," you say. "It's all for fun."

"Fun? What kind of perverted fun is this?" Kelly says angrily. "Change me back now!"

"Look, just smash the bench, and then if you really want, I'll change you back," you say. "I think you look good as a giantess."

Kelly does not look like she's having any fun right now. If anything, she looks like she wants to beat you up...
135.title: Screw it, just use the remote now!

choices: You comply and return Kelly to normal.
Mary takes the remote from you.
You decide to grow Mary too!
1352.content:
You hear the slapping of Mary's sandals as she runs down the stone walkway toward you. She stops and looks up in horror at the giant Kelly. "Oh my God!" she shrieks. "What's happened to you, Kelly?"

"Ask him!" Kelly's voice booms as she points a finger at you. "He's the one who did this to me."

"W-What do you mean?" Mary says, obviously confused.

"He's got something in his hand that made me bigger," Kelly says.

Mary looks and sees the remote in your hand. "What the hell is that, Nick?" she asks.

"It's a size-changing remote," you say. "Its use is pretty obvious. I just wanted to have some fun."

"What are you talking about?" says Mary. "You can't just turn people into giants!"

"He says he did it so I could smash the bench," Kelly says. "And of course, my shoes broke, so I guess he expects me to just step on it with my bare feet."

"Never mind the bench!" says Mary. She turns her gaze directly to you and puts on her 'boss' tone. "Nick," she says, "I don't know exactly how you made Kelly this big, but if someone were to see this, it could be serious. Change her back. Now."

"But--" you start to say.

"Now!" Mary says. "Or do I have to take that thing from you?"
1352.title: Mary comes running outside

choices: Kelly smashes the remote.
Mary stops Kelly.
13521.content:
Not wanting to risk any more trouble, you nod your head in surrender. "Fine," you say. "Just hold still."

"I didn't plan on going anywhere," Kelly says snidely.

With the appropriate settings, you return Kelly to her normal size. The process looks similar to when she grew, just in reverse. Her body contracts and her dimensions fold inward until she's the 5'10" woman you've known for the past several years. But, ever the one to get the last word, you take a parting shot. "Was that so bad?" you say.

Kelly has her arms folded across her chest. She bends down and picks up her broken flip-flops, then steps toward you. She holds the flip-flops up to your face. "You owe me a new pair," she says.

You nod. "I'll get you some later," you say.

Before you can say anything else, though, Kelly punches you in the stomach. You crumple to the ground; you always were a bit weak in that area. Once on the ground, Kelly kicks you a couple times.

"What the fuck were you thinking?" she says as she kicks you. "What kind of pervert are you?" You don't really have the chance to say anything. You're too busy trying to shield yourself. You raise your arms in defense, exposing the remote, which Kelly rips out of your hands and throws to the ground.

"You really wanna me see me smash something?" Kelly growls. "Watch this and enjoy it while it lasts!" She raises her bare foot over the remote. You know what's coming, but it hurts to move. Your only hope to save that remote is Mary...
13521.title: You comply and return Kelly to normal.

choices: Look through the manual.
Mary comes back and wants to talk to you.
135212.content:
Mary wraps her arms around Kelly and hauls the young woman back a few feet. "Kelly, calm down!" she says.

"Are you kidding? After what he did to me?" Kelly says. "He's got some perverted fantasy about giant women or something!"

Mary points toward the clubhouse. "Go inside and calm down. I'm the boss here. I'll deal with him."

Kelly hesitates, panting heavily from anger, but stomps inside and slams the clubhouse door behind her. After a moment, Mary gently walks over to you, picks up the remote, then helps you up.

"Are you badly hurt?" Mary asks.

You shake your head. "I might be bruised and sore tomorrow, but nothing's broken."

Mary nods. "Good." She pauses, then says, "I think you need to come inside with me."

"Well, my shift isn't over yet, so I figured that--" You stop yourself as Mary shoots you an unfriendly look. You return to the clubhouse in silence from that point on.

Mary heads toward the back room. "I'll be back in a moment," she says. "Try not to cause trouble."

You say nothing. You just sit in one of the chairs, looking out at the still-deserted parking lot. You are somewhat glad that no one else saw that. Mary's right; things could have gotten out of hand. Then again, you feel like maybe things did get out of hand. Kelly is normally very nice and likes joking around. Granted, she's never experienced anything like that before, but still...the way she reacted afterward wasn't like her at all. You've never known her to be violent.

Somewhere, in the back of your mind, you wonder if you should consult the manual for the remote. You have it in your back pocket; you keep it with you just in case something happens that you're unfamiliar with. This might count as one of those times. Maybe you can read up on it before Mary gets back.
135212.title: Mary stops Kelly.

choices: Look for the remote.
Wait for Mary to come back.
1352121.content:
You reach into your back pocket and unfold a small but thick stack of papers. Most of the details in this manual are highly technical. Virtually all of the science is beyond your comprehension. You don't know exactly what you're looking for in these pages, but maybe something will spring out at you. Then again, maybe there's nothing inherently wrong with the device; it could just be that Kelly is really mad at you.

You start at the front, where you see this initial set of instructions: CAUTION: Do not get device wet. Do not expose device to harsh elements, like prolonged sunlight.

Really? Can I feed it after midnight? you ask yourself. You keep reading. Finally you find a section that discusses the effects of growth on a living subject. Sifting through the jargon, you discover that there is one side effect of using the device to grow people. A chemical imbalance takes place that makes the target more violent. Prolonged exposure could have far-reaching consequences.

Now armed with this knowledge, you wonder if you should dare try the remote on Kelly again. If you're not careful, she could end up as a rampaging giant. Then again, maybe you want that. But right now you can't do anything, because Mary has the remote. It might be time to get that back.
1352121.title: Look through the manual.

choices: Kelly reverts to normal size.
Kelly grows bigger!
13522.content:
"I mean it, Nick," says Mary. "If you don't change Kelly back, I'll take that thing and I'll do it myself."

"But you wouldn't know how to use it," you say, although you know the controls are fairly intuitive. "You might make things worse."

"Then you'd better get to it, shouldn't you?" Mary counters.

"I think he needs a little encouragement," Kelly says. She hovers her right foot over you. You stare up at her massive pink sole, mostly excited but a little apprehensive. "I probably weigh enough to crush you," Kelly says, "but even if I don't, I bet this'll hurt...a lot."

"Kelly, don't do that!" says Mary. "This is no time for games." Tired of waiting, Mary snatches the remote from your hand while you're busy staring at Kelly's foot.

"Hey!" you say.

"Enough!" says Mary. "You'll be lucky if I don't fire you for this."

Kelly snorts. "He's lucky I didn't just smash him." Her foot is still over you. Kelly sneers. "I'm surprised you haven't tried to run," she says. "Are my feet that attractive?" She wiggles her toes.

Mary looks over the remote. "I think I know how this works," she says. "Are you ready, Kelly?"

Kelly looks at Mary and nods, then turns back to you. "If this doesn't work," she says, "you're going to be a lot flatter." She chuckles, but it's an evil chuckle.

"Okay, here goes." Mary activates the remote. A beam of light hits Kelly and...
13522.title: Mary takes the remote from you.

choices: Kelly does, in fact, come after you through the course.
Enraged, Kelly damages the clubhouse further.
The police arrive.
1353.content:
"I swear, Nick," says Kelly, "this isn't funny. Undo whatever the hell you did to me right now."

Just then you hear a motor nearby. Very near, in fact. You and Kelly look over to the parking lot, where a silver minivan has just pulled in. A mother with two young kids come out. Because of the distance from there to the clubhouse, they must not have taken notice of Kelly, but now that they're out of the van, they notice all too well. The kids start screaming frantically.

"Monster! Monster!" they start crying. The mother tries to hurry them back into the van.

Kelly growls at you. "Dammit, Nick!" she says. She then turns toward the mom and kids. "It's okay, really, there's nothing to be afraid of!" she says. She adjusts her body and moves her feet, but she didn't think about the clearance she would need to swing her legs like that. Her left foot smacks into the brick and metal structure on Hole #11, which is designed to look like Humpty Dumpty. It doesn't break, but to Kelly, the impact is like stubbing your toe on the corner of a piece of furniture.

"Shit!" Kelly roars in pain. Slightly off-balance, she wobbles a bit. She puts a hand out to steady herself, which is right on the clubhouse awning. It fails to hold, and her hand crashes right through. Tiles and wood fall into the walkway around the clubhouse windows. By now, the mom and kids have hopped in the van and sped away. No one knows what they're going to do with the sight they just saw, but suddenly you feel a knot in your stomach. It's the kind of feeling you get when something very bad is about to happen.

This feeling is further validated when Kelly glares at you with fire in her eyes. "What the fuck is wrong with you, Nick?" she bellows. "Are you enjoying this?"

A sense of dread washes over you. Almost instinctively, you start to back away. "Kelly, calm down, I'm sorry," you say.

"If you're sorry, then change me back! NOW!" Kelly roars. She takes a step toward you -- presumably without fulling considering her current size -- and steps right onto the bench you were supposed to move. With a quick cracking and crunching sound, the bench now resembles kindling like Kelly had previously been talking about. "Happy now?" Kelly demands. "Did that get your rocks off?"

She is clearly furious with you. This is a bad situation. And, naturally, you make things worse by running in terror. Not far, mind you, but toward the back end of the mini-golf course, thinking that Kelly won't come after you with all those obstacles in her way. But there's something you didn't count on...
1353.title: A customer pulls into the parking lot.

choices: Both women grow to 20 feet.
Both women grow, but Mary is a foot taller than Kelly.
Mary grows to 7 feet, but Kelly shrinks to 5'5".
Mary grows to 6'6", but Kelly grows to 10 feet.
Nothing happens.
14.content:
You decide to be bold and grow both of them. This should be a lot of fun, you think to yourself. The only question is how to pull it off. Odds are they wouldn't like it if they knew you did that to them, so you'll have to be discreet. You head outside and decide to "clean" the water feature at the end of the mini-golf course. Maybe you'll catch them by surprise.

Sure enough, Mary and Kelly both come outside after a few minutes. They're still talking to each other, but Mary sees you cleaning and waves. You wave back, and the two of them walk out to the parking lot towards Kelly's car. They stop about halfway. You can see they're wide in the open, so you can grow them quite a bit if you wanted.

That gets you thinking of something else. Obviously, you could just grow both of them to something like 10 or 20 feet, just to start small. But since Kelly is already a bit taller than Mary, maybe you could grow them and leave Mary taller than Kelly. That might be really funny. In any event, you don't know if growing two women at the same is even possible with the remote. Still, it's worth trying.

You slip away from the water feature and walk toward them, standing in the awning at the edge of the clubhouse and still several feet away. They're not looking your way; there's no time like the present! You aim the remote at them, push the button, and...
14.title: Grow both women.

choices: They ask you to make them 150ft
Both of them snap at you for being a pervert
You talk with them more
141.content:
You press the button of the remote like so and a strange beam comes out of the front end of the remote and hits both Kelly and Mary, and suddenly they grow to 20 feet tall, (their clothes grow with them). Mary and Kelly started to see you hiding in one of the bushes and started walking towards your hiding spot.

"Hey you, don't be afraid, just come on out." Mary said. You then followed her orders and revealed yourself to the girls. "I don't know what you are doing, but Iike it."

"Me too!" Kelly added.

"Uhh.... Okay, now what do you want from me?" you panicked.

"Nothing at all from you. I like what you done, making us 20ft, I just want to know." Kelly said.

"It's fine." Mary added.

"Well uh... I was testing out this new size remote controller and I figure you 2 would be great." you explained to them.

What happens now?
141.title: We like it

choices: Grow them anyway!
Politely decline
One of them takes the device before you can make a decision
1411.content:
"Well, why'd you stop at 20 feet?" Kelly asks you.

"I, uh... I wasn't sure if you'd..." you stammer. Now that you're actually talking with two real giantesses, you're not quite sure what to say. You're too shocked to do anything more than gawk. Mary and Kelly just giggle.

"But Kelly did have a point," Mary says. "Why not make us bigger... say, 150 feet?" This is practically a dream come true for you. Not only are there two giantesses standing in front of you, but they want to be bigger! The problem is, you're not sure if you should comply... who knows what they might get up to at that size?
1411.title: 150 feet?!

choices: Mary and Kelly notice you outside.
You make it back in without being caught.
142.content:
Two thin beams of light come out of the remote and strike both women. They don't seem to notice, but slowly they start getting bigger. It almost looks exactly like those old sci-fi movies, except these effects are real. You're not sure how to adjust the settings so that Mary gets taller than Kelly, so you just sort of tilt the remote more toward Mary and hope that's good enough. Mary's body starts to grow faster than Kelly, and when it looks good enough (from your vantage point) you stop. Kelly, who used to be 5'10", is now about 6'4". She looks like she could make for a good basketball player now. And of course, you made Mary taller by about a foot, so she's 7'4" and looking down at Kelly.

"Holy shit!" says Kelly. "What's happened to you, Mary? Did I shrink or something?"

Mary looks around, noticeably nervous. "I don't think so, Kelly," she says. "Everything seems smaller to me now. I think I grew, and judging by the look of it, I grew a lot."

Kelly walks over to her car and tries to measure herself. "My head has never been this high above the top of my car," she says. "I think I grew, too!"

"So, we both suddenly just grew?" Mary says. "That doesn't make sense."

"Let's head back to the clubhouse," Kelly says. "We can't exactly do anything standing in the parking lot."

"Good idea," says Mary. The two women start to head back. You don't want to be seen with the remote, that could blow your cover! You try to get back into the clubhouse and pretend like you don't know anything. Will it work?
142.title: Mary is taller than Kelly now

choices: A bug tries to eat you.
Mary and Kelly run over to you and pick you up.
A customer starts walking toward you, unaware.
145.content:
Nothing happened at all, you try to press the bottom several times, and you even try banging it several times, but nothing happened at all. You smtry switching the batteries in hope of getting it fix, but it doesn't work.

"Great, that is just great, my device diesn't work at all!!!!" You grunted as you throw the control at on the ground, but suddenly, a strange light appears and it hits you. Then you suddenly started to see the world get bigger around you, and you shrink into you are only three inches tall. Now so small, you started to panic.

"Oh no, I shrank! Someone.. Help me!!" you yelled out.

Suddenly..?
145.title: Device is jammed!

info.brief_description: Shrinking and/or growth at a golf course complex.
info.description:
You work at a golf course that has three parts: an 18-hole minigolf course, a 9-hole Par 3, and a driving range. Aside from you, the worker on this shift, there are two other major characters:

Mary, the owner of the golf course, is about 5'8" and has size 8 feet. She's 45 years old and nice most of the time, but she loves being the boss and taking charge.

Kelly, the owner's niece, is about 5'10 and has size 9 feet. She's 30 years old and likes chatting with you, and she doesn't like the way Mary runs the business. She thinks she could make for a better owner.

Today you brought with you a size-changing device which serves as the catalyst of the story. The rest is self-explanatory.


Ground rules:

1. No sex. Some nudity is okay, but don't go overboard.

2. No vore/toilet/insertion related things. Keep this as foot-related/crush-related as possible.

3. It is up to you whether you want the interaction to be shrink or growth as you write the chapters. Just no giant males.

4. Shrinking should be limited to no smaller than 3 inches, and growth no bigger than 150 feet.

5. The size-changing device can be broken. If that happens, you must find another way for the size changing to take place.

6. Don't do one-line chapters. I reserve the right to delete anything I find unsatisfactory.

7. If you have questions, message me.

8. NEW RULE: Make sure ANY and ALL giantesses are AT LEAST 18 years of age!

Naturally, since this is an interactive, I encourage people to add to this themselves! Trust me, if I'm left to write it all, it would only be a matter of time before all the branches converged to the same thing. Get in there and add some of your own flavor!
